title: I just bought new pixel 5, it was always very hot in hands though iam not using continuously
content:
It was hot always, even I did not installed any app from unboxing.
It was getting warm back side always.
Even my 4 years mobile won't get this much warm
So, iam requesting to fix my issue.
I just bought new pixel 5 yestrday.
So please check my issue and hoping to get resolved
